jobDesc: Project lead handling multiple clients and projects including Requirement Gathering, Proposals and Estimates, Design, Development, Schedule Tracking, Manufacturing and Deployment
Responsible as project lead to deliver complete end to end solution for client.
Teaching project based AI with javascript and VR concepts to school kids.

As a part of Aerospace group, I majorly dealt with ATE development and Electronics Hardware and Software Development.

	System Designing of ATE including Hardware, Software and Admin
	LabView module development
	Electronic Schematic Designing and Analysis
	DO-160F based document review.

Worked on SmartHomes project. My responsibilities involved 
	Prototyping of the product
	Embedded Programming
	Central Intelligent Hub development. 
 Platforms worked on involve Python, Arduino, ESP8266 etc

Developed projects such as
